description: An intelligent multilingual AI voice assistant capable of understanding and responding in multiple languages using NLP and speech recognition.
longDescription: Nova is an advanced AI-powered voice assistant built with Python and Flask. It leverages state-of-the-art NLP models for intent recognition and supports real-time speech-to-text and text-to-speech in multiple languages. The system uses a REST API backend to process voice commands and return intelligent responses.

title: AI Portfolio Website
